content.rendered:
TOPICS TO BE COVERED

  • Fundamentals of Electricity
  • Applications of Electricity
  • Magnetism and Electro Magnetic Induction Principles
  • AC & DC Machines
  • Electrical Wiring i.e. Domestic wiring, Industrial wiring
  • Transformers and Alternators
  • AC&DC; Winding
  • Tyristors and VVVF Drives
  • Stepper Motor Controls

EXERCISES TO BE DONE

  • All Types of Electrical Cable Joints
  • All Types of Meter Connections involving with Electricity like Voltmeter, Ammeter, Energy Meter, PF Meter, Watt Meter, Energy Meter, Frequency Meter
  • All Types of AC & DC Machines installations and Wiring
  • All Types of Wiring i.e. Domestic and Industrial Wiring
  • Connections and Maintenance of AC &DC; Machines
  • Maintenance of Transformers and Altometer
  • All Types of wiring i.e. AC &DC; Wiring
  • Erection of Electrical Poles and Electrical Line Distribution

UNIQUE FEATURES

  • Well Equipped Work Shop
  • World Standard Machinery
  • Well Trained Faculty and Experts in Work Shops Activities
  • Industry Interface for real exposer to engines
